alert.note: Alert for Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 27 at 2:17PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Minnesota, including the following county, Freeborn. * WHEN...From 10 PM CDT this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rounds of heavy rainfall could produce totals of 2 to 4 inches, leading to the possibility of flash flooding, especially in urban areas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
